TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CCTransitionFlipY extends Cocos2D.CCTransitionSceneOriented

summary.para: : Flips the screen vertically. The front face is the outgoing scene and the back face is the incoming scene.

public CCTransitionFlipY (float t, Cocos2D.CCScene s, Cocos2D.CCTransitionOrientation o);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(float32 t, class Cocos2D.CCScene s, valuetype Cocos2D.CCTransitionOrientation o) cil managed
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void OnEnter() cil managed

Docs.summary: Event callback that is invoked every time when enters the 'stage'. If the enters the 'stage' with a transition, this event is called when the transition starts. During onEnter you can't access a "sister/brother" node. If you override onEnter, you shall call its parent's one, e.g., Node::onEnter().
